tool_description: Generates formatted meeting proposals with multiple time options, participant details, and meeting information for distribution to attendees.

optimal_times.description: Array of optimal meeting times to include in proposal

meeting_description.description: Description or agenda for the meeting

meeting_location.description: Meeting location or video conference link

response_deadline.description: Deadline for participants to respond to proposal

include_timezone_info.description: Whether to include timezone information for each participant

proposal_format.description: Format of proposal: email, calendar_invite, or structured_text

priority_level.description: Meeting priority: low, normal, high, or urgent

error_messages: Invalid meeting title: Title cannot be empty and must be under 200 characters.
Invalid optimal times: Each time must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp string.
Invalid participant emails: One or more email addresses are not properly formatted.
Invalid organizer email: Organizer email must be a valid email address.
Invalid duration: duration_minutes must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Invalid response deadline: Must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp in the future.
Invalid proposal format: Use one of [email, calendar_invite, structured_text].
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, normal, high, urgent].
Too many time options: Maximum 5 optimal times allowed in proposal.
Participant limit exceeded: Maximum 50 participants allowed per proposal.
usage: Provide meeting_title, optimal_times, participant_emails, duration_minutes, and organizer_email. Optionally configure meeting_description, location, response_deadline, and formatting options. Returns formatted meeting proposal ready for distribution.

proposal_content.description: Formatted meeting proposal content ready for sending

proposal_subject.description: Suggested subject line for the proposal

participant_count.description: Number of participants included in proposal

estimated_response_time.description: Estimated time needed for all participants to respond

proposal_id.description: Unique identifier for tracking this proposal
